article_title: HCA Unveils $3 Billion Buyback Program as Profit Falls 13%
article_text:
HCA Holdings Inc. said its board authorized the repurchase of an additional $3 billion of its shares as the hospital operator reported third-quarter earnings that fell 13%.

The latest stock-buyback plan brings the total authorization to $3.35 billion as of Oct. 23, including the amount remaining under its previous $1 billion share repurchase...
